plugins\/sonarr\/desktop\/php\/sonarr.ph.Renseignez l'api Key de votre applicatio: Input the api key for your application
plugins\/sonarr\/desktop\/php\/sonarr.ph.Possibilité d'affichage du widget en con: Checkbox to show the widget in it's condensed format (see documentation for more informations)
plugins\/sonarr\/desktop\/php\/sonarr.ph.Fréquence de rafraîchissement de l'équip: Frequency which you would like your equipement to be refreshed
plugins\/sonarr\/desktop\/php\/sonarr.ph.Cliquer sur ? pour afficher l'assistant: Click on ? to show the refresh frequency tool
plugins\/sonarr\/desktop\/php\/sonarr.ph.Nombre de jours à remonter: Number of days to return episodes for
plugins\/sonarr\/desktop\/php\/sonarr.ph.Nombre d'objets max à remonter: Number max of objects to return
plugins\/sonarr\/desktop\/php\/sonarr.ph.Par défaut le plugin retourne les objets: By default the plugin returns the objects of today
plugins\/sonarr\/desktop\/php\/sonarr.ph.Si non renseigné, seule la règle du nomb: The rule of number days has the priority, if there is no number max, the plugin will return all the episodes for the given days
plugins\/sonarr\/desktop\/php\/sonarr.ph.Vous pouvez sélectionner ici un séparate: Input here the separator for object list
plugins\/sonarr\/desktop\/php\/sonarr.ph.Ici, vous pouvez configurer le formatage: Input here the formatting you want to use for the episodes. The season number is %s and the episode number is %e. You can for exemple enter: SEASON %s EPISODE %e
